text: Robert Sherwood Morse (April 10, 1924 – May 28, 2015) was an American bishop who became the founding archbishop of the Anglican Province of Christ the King. A 1950 graduate of Seabury-Western Theological Seminary, he was ordained to the diaconate on July 8, 1950, and to the priesthood on February 22, 1951. He founded the Anglican Province of Christ the King in 1977. ==References== == External links == *Official biography Category:1924 births Category:2015 deaths Category:American Continuing Anglican bishops Category:American Anglo- Catholics Category:Anglo-Catholic bishops
title: Robert S. Morse
